db:abstract.db:para: A QML app using Qt Quick Controls 2 and a QML plugin with customized controls.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = flatstyle
QT += quick quickcontrols2 widgets
SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ qtquickcontrols2.conf \ flatstyle.qml \ MainForm.ui.qml \ Flat/Button.qml \ Flat/CheckBox.qml \ Flat/Switch.qml \ imports/Theme/Theme.qml \ imports/Theme/qmldir
# Additional import path used to resolve QML modules in Qt Creator's code model QML_IMPORT_PATH = $$PWD/imports
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols2/flatstyle INSTALLS += target
